title: Inkscapetober Day 23: Leak
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 23:** Leak
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image Kensing.png]]


**Subject:** Kensing 

**Commentary:** Kensing is a citizen of the greater Pittsburgh area and wrote a couple of tales and SCPs dealing with the Greazeburger company. Well, one and one adds up to this coat of arms. In the middle we see a modified version of the arms of the Earl of Pitt, after which the city of Pittsburgh is named. The coat has been heavily greazed up. The outer circle cotains the motto of Pittsburgh, //Benigno Numine//, but the stains have transformed this into //Benign U Mine//.

**How the prompt fits in:** This one was a lot of fun to make. The idea that a coat of arms can leak and in doing so en passant changes the motto is just very funny to me.

@@ @@
